name: fugu
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the Japanese word for pufferfish (= a type of fish whose body contains a poison that can kill people), or a dish prepared from this fish: The fugu is a delicacy prepared in Japanese restaurants by specially trained chefs.
YOSHIKAZU TSUNO/AFP/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesSome consider the liver to be the tastiest part of the fugu, but it is also the most poisonous.Usuki is the Oita town most famous for fugu.He showed that fugu could be made poison-free by strictly controlling its feed.The fugu fish is known for its fearsome nerve poison.He insisted that fugu liver, whether farmed or wild, was simply too dangerous.
